title: textbooks?
content: im a fresher (cse) and was wondering if we need to carry/buy any textbooks or other study material of the sort with us.

comments.body: same question, all im carrying is a bunch of papers and some pens
just get about 5 notebooks, or a 5 in 1 notebook and a pen. That's all you need. Everything else you need is online. If you prefer a physical copy, there are plenty in the library.

dont even consider buying a textbook in 1st year, the teachers will make you buy (especially mech - statics) dont ever fall for it. 1st year resources are completely online. Just dont waste money as these subjects are mostly useless depending on your requirements 
one 5 in 1 notebook should get you through the semester, and they will also provide 1, so rather just wait till they give
u kinda would be forced to buy that statics book if your subject teacher is sv venkatesh,cos he would just kick you out of class if u dont have
oh damn, in ec or rr though? I'm in ec
my senior friend in pes said he hasn't bought any book, everything is digital, u can buy if u want physical copy or some copy thats not available, but u wont "need" to buy anything tho.
